title: The Pacific century. Faculty manual
creator_credit: CPB Project, Annenberg, PBI Productions and Westview Press
brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Pacific century”.
To accompany The Pacific century telecourse. The Faculty manual consists of an overview, identification of points for emphasis, biographies, discussion topics, true/false questions, multiple choice questions and answer key.
creator_credit_for_label: CPB Project, Annenberg, PBI Productions and Westview Press
